text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, ʙaroi Alloh taolo ʙa adl ʙarxezed, [va] ʙa adolat sahodat dihed. Va alʙatta, naʙojad dusmanii jak guruh sumoro ʙar on dorad, ki adolat nakuned. Adolat kuned, ki in [kor] ʙa parhezkori nazdiktar ast va az Alloh taolo parvo kuned [ʙitarsed], [ki] ʙe tardid, Alloh taolo ʙa on ci ancom medihed, ogoh ast
